headline: When Cheap Isn't Enough: Rethinking PayPal's Investment Case
summary: PayPal looks cheap, but slowing growth, shrinking moat, make it more likely a value trap than a real growth story.

raw.headline: When Cheap Isn't Enough: Rethinking PayPal's Investment Case
raw.summary: PayPal looks cheap, but slowing growth, shrinking moat, make it more likely a value trap than a real growth story.

headline: Verizon Issues $20 Credits to Customers Affected by Outage
summary: “Yesterday, we did not meet the standard of excellence our customers expect and that we expect of ourselves,” Verizon said in a statement Thursday morning.  The company is offering $20 account credits, which should cover “multiple days of service.”  People began noticing service disruptions shortly before noon in New York, according to Downdetector.

raw.headline: Verizon Issues $20 Credits to Customers Affected by Outage
raw.summary: “Yesterday, we did not meet the standard of excellence our customers expect and that we expect of ourselves,” Verizon said in a statement Thursday morning. headline: Pinch AI Raises $5M, Co-Led by Dynamo and Infinity Ventures to Give Retailers an AI Defense Against Exploding Return Fraud
summary: Pinch, the AI-powered post-purchase intelligence platform that helps retailers reward loyal customers and prevent return fraud, announced a $5 million total seed round. The seed round was co-led by Dynamo Ventures and Infinity Ventures with additional participation from Defined Capital and PayPal Ventures.

raw.headline: Pinch AI Raises $5M, Co-Led by Dynamo and Infinity Ventures to Give Retailers an AI Defense Against Exploding Return Fraud

headline: PayPal alums build fraud startup
summary: Veterans from the digital payments pioneer founded Pinch AI and have raised capital for a business that detects fraudulent returns.

raw.headline: PayPal alums build fraud startup
raw.summary: Veterans from the digital payments pioneer founded Pinch AI and have raised capital for a business that detects fraudulent returns.

headline: Personal Loan Stocks Q3 Recap: Benchmarking Affirm (NASDAQ:AFRM)
summary: As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q3. Today, we are looking at personal loan stocks, starting with Affirm (NASDAQ:AFRM).
